Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine mid red-brown; cream slip. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 203, 7? Name Polyaratos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 140.28.a.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1135)
